entities.name: mayhem
entities.description: Mayhem is mentioned as occurring at the Ministry. ("MAYHEM AT THE MINISTRY")

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is a government organization that is being criticized for its blunders and lax security. ("Ministry blunders . . . culprits not apprehended  . . . lax security")

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill Weasley is a member of the Weasley family who hands his father the newspaper. ("Bill handed his father the newspaper.")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a member of the group who helps make tea for Mrs. Weasley. ("When they were all crammed into the tiny kitchen, and Hermione had made Mrs. Weasley a cup of very strong tea")

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a member of the group who receives tea from Hermione. ("When they were all crammed into the tiny kitchen, and Hermione had made Mrs. Weasley a cup of very strong tea")

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a member of the Weasley family who reads the newspaper and criticizes the Ministry. ("Mr. Weasley scanned the front page while Percy looked over his shoulder.")

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy Weasley is a member of the Weasley family who looks over his father's shoulder and criticizes Rita Skeeter. ("Percy furiously. . . . That woman’s got it in for the Ministry of Magic!")

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a journalist who writes articles criticizing the Ministry. ("Who wrote this? Ah . . . of course . . . Rita Skeeter.")

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley criticizes the Ministry for its blunders and lax security. ("I knew it,” said Mr. Weasley heavily. “Ministry blunders . . . culprits not apprehended  . . . lax security")
Percy criticizes Rita Skeeter for her biased reporting. ("That woman’s got it in for the Ministry of Magic!")
